courses.title: Hip Hop Dance Basics
courses.description: Master the fundamental moves of hip hop dance in this beginner-friendly course.

courses.title: Ballet for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the elegance and technique of ballet with expert instruction tailored for beginners.

courses.title: Contemporary Dance Techniques
courses.description: Explore expressive movement and develop your skills in contemporary dance.

courses.title: Salsa Mastery
courses.description: Become proficient in the vibrant and rhythmic dance style of salsa with comprehensive training.

courses.title: Tap Dance Workshop
courses.description: Learn the rhythmic art of tap dancing with step-by-step guidance from experienced instructors.

courses.title: Urban Dance Styles
courses.description: Explore various urban dance styles including krumping, locking, and waacking.

courses.title: Latin Dance Fusion
courses.description: Blend Latin dance styles like salsa, merengue, and bachata into dynamic fusion routines.

courses.title: Ballroom Dance Essentials
courses.description: Master the classic ballroom dances including waltz, foxtrot, and tango.

courses.title: K-pop Dance Choreography
courses.description: Learn popular K-pop dance routines and choreography from top hits.

courses.title: Flamenco Dance Intensive
courses.description: Immerse yourself in the passionate art of flamenco dance with intensive training.
